column45: Comments

Water a bit brown, lifeguards on ATVs, sand in sample, light breeze, 1-2 ft surf; 4th turbidity taken. Read temperatures at first site 2x and then seemed to stabilize then. 1st temp read = DO: 26.2, SAL: 26.6, and pH: 26.5.
More churned up than normal, 1-2 ft surf, 4th turbidity taken, VOC/SVOC sample taken.
Slight brown water, 1' surf; 4th turbidity taken
Calm, clear, 4th turbidity 2.92 (replaced second turbidity value: 3.74 after scanning in datasheets)
Read DO 2x for temp; awful smell from garbage nins; immediate area next to sample site isn't burned but mauka is; 4th turbidity taken. Metal sample taken.
Lots of ash in samples; stream flow is steady; light breeze; DO temp/ salinity temp are spot on. Metal sample taken.
Ash in stormdrains; surrounded by burn areas. VOC/SVOC sample taken for WRRC. Metal sample taken.

Burn all around area; lots of ash in sample. HACH probes measures made after filtered because of oil contamination. Using turbidity spare vial for this site: Blank Spare vial pre-sampling verification read 0.19 NTU but read 0.05 NTU for post-sampling verification back at lab; Did not filter turbidity samples before testing. VOC/SVOC sample taken for WRRC. Metal sample taken. Metal sample taken.

Burned area all around except for 505 Front St white building (photo taken). Water looked surprisinginly clear. Foul water pooling in 505 Front St. parking structure. VOC/SVOC sample collected from parking structure. ENT samples taken for Surfrider.
Area so burned, it was difficult to find site. Water brown. Hard to filter nutrient sample. Broke nutrient bottle. ENT samples taken for Surfrider. Metal sample taken.
Large metal debris in water when sampling. ENT samples taken for Surfrider. Metal sample taken.
Sunny; shorebreak; took temperature twice; 4th turbidity taken 3.45
Sunny; shorebreak; brown water; took temperature twice (?)
Sunny; small shorebreak; breeze picking up after sampling; debris on beach
Sunny; breezy; shorebreak; no debris
Read pH twice to confirm; rot smell from Mala Tavern; tide falling next low will be at 12:39 pm
Water brown; visible ash and debris
Much less oil and ash in harbor and sample water
Small shorebreak; sunny; no clouds; light breeze; same amount of water in flooded parking lot as last week
Brown water; fine sediment; sand in sample; multiple schools of fish; 4th turbidity taken 16.4
Extremely brown water; lots of large debris in water near sample collection
Sprinkles of rain along West Maui; low tide at 7:52 am; trickle of water inflow from storm drain
Sprinkles of rain along West Maui; low tide at 7:52 am; stream flowing; boom replaced; sunny; hot; light breeze just starting
Sprinkles of rain along West Maui; low tide at 7:52 am
Sprinkles of rain along West Maui; low tide at 7:52 am; US Coast Guard surveying for deris removal; only slight oil sheen on harbor water surface
Sprinkles of rain along West Maui; low tide at 7:52 am
Sprinkles of rain along West Maui; low tide at 7:52 am
Sprinkles of rain along West Maui; low tide at 7:52 am; monk seal; less visible turbidity; hot outside
High tide at 8:33 am 2.2 ft high; ENT samples taken at all sires for Surfrider BWTF; Higher/bigger shorebreak; turtles in the water; cloud cover; 4th turbidity taken 4.03; 5th turbidity taken 2.79
High tide at 8:33 am 2.2 ft high; ENT samples taken at all sires for Surfrider BWTF; Small stream flow about 3 ft wide
High tide at 8:33 am 2.2 ft high; ENT samples taken at all sires for Surfrider BWTF;  Wind picking up then died down again; some swell coming in
High tide at 8:33 am 2.2 ft high; ENT samples taken at all sires for Surfrider BWTF;  New booms around the harbor perimeter next to water; USCG excavating debris from harbor water

High tide at 8:33 am 2.2 ft high; ENT samples taken at all sires for Surfrider BWTF;  Flooding in parking lot looks the same, maybe some receding; photo taken; water brown at shoreline; cloud cover; 4th turbidity taken 4.29
High tide at 8:33 am 2.2 ft high; ENT samples taken at all sires for Surfrider BWTF; water very brown; sunny
High tide at 8:33 am 2.2 ft high; ENT samples taken at all sires for Surfrider BWTF; very brown water; Hawaii Electric Co. doing work/excavation next to mobile lab
Rocky beach; small rolling rocks coming back; calm day; sprinkling; onshore breezy
Rotten egg/sulfur smell within 100 ft; light wave action; breezy
Breezy; seems like high tide
Windy; calm
High tide at 8:49 am at 2.2 ft; turbidity particulates floating; 4th turbidity taken 1.59
High tide at 8:49 am at 2.2 ft; Eagle rays; brown water with sand and charred particles; no wind; no shade; 4th turbidity taken 5.71
High tide at 8:49 am at 2.2 ft; Light wave action; water not clear
High tide at 8:49 am at 2.2 ft; barge removing boats to clean harbor; lots of USCG members; 4th/5th turbidity taken 1.20/1.24
High tide at 8:49 am at 2.2 ft; using spare turbidity bottle for rest of day; used GPS coordinates from site code page; 4th turbidity taken 2.59
High tide at 8:49 am at 2.2 ft; brown water; whiite flaking particulates; 4th turbidity taken 13.9
High tide at 8:49 am at 2.2 ft; crew shredding/chipping branches on. Front Street near site; very brown water; sapre turbidity post verification=0.05 NTU; 4th/5th turbidity taken 38.5/39.3
ENT sample taken for Surfrider BWTF. Turbidity 4th = 1.98, 5th = 1.68. Post verfication turbidity was >0.1 three times.
ENT sample taken for Surfrider BWTF. Mala Ramp open to boaters. Trickle in stream, not flowing all the way to ocean. Post verfication turbidity was >0.1 three times.
ENT sample taken for Surfrider BWTF. Algae in sample; some swell out at the break; partly cloudy; low tide. Post verfication turbidity was >0.1 three times.
ENT sample taken for Surfrider BWTF. Slick and ash visible in sample. Low tide. Post verfication turbidity was >0.1 three times.
ENT sample taken for Surfrider BWTF. Spare turbidity vile used after Lahaina harbor. Low tide. Low swell. Light breeze. Post verfication turbidity was >0.1 three times.

ENT sample taken for Surfrider BWTF. Spare turbidity vile used after Lahaina harbor. Low tide. Pretty clear water than usual. Sediment layer under feet. Post verfication turbidity was >0.1 three times.

ENT sample taken for Surfrider BWTF. Spare turbidity vile used after Lahaina harbor. Low tide. Dark brown/black particles/debris in shoreline. Brown water 3ft into shoreline, then way more clear than usual at knee depth. Sediment under feet. Post verfication turbidity was >0.1 three times.
high tide, slight breeze, sunny, unknown if fresh water flow due to tide
light breeze, calm water, corrected turb readings after noticing wrong cell used originally
small swell, calm, clear skies, 4th Turb 2.53
calm water, sunny, floating black particles in water
light breeze, clear water, small swell
light brown water & turbid near shore, small swell, 4th Turb 12.8
murky brown water near shore, sediment visible, calm conditions

ENT sample taken for Surfrider BWTF; rained last week; used spare turbidity vial for all samples; spare pre-verification = 0.05 NTU; lab-verification = 0.06 NTU; 3rd reading D.O. no change; low tide; 4th turbidity = 1.20

ENT sample taken for Surfrider BWTF; rained last week; used spare turbidity vial for all samples; spare pre-verification = 0.05 NTU; lab-verification = 0.06 NTU; minimal flow with seawater flowing into the channel; water has visible ash and slightly brown overall; 4th turbidity = 4.15
ENT sample taken for Surfrider BWTF; rained last week; used spare turbidity vial for all samples; spare pre-verification = 0.05 NTU; lab-verification = 0.06 NTU; sunny; no wind; 4th turbidity = 4.10

ENT sample taken for Surfrider BWTF; rained last week; used spare turbidity vial for all samples; spare pre-verification = 0.05 NTU; lab-verification = 0.06 NTU; boat parked at sample site; a lot less visible oil; clarity is high; lot less particulates; sampled between the boat and the harbor wall; 4th turbidity = 0.94

ENT sample taken for Surfrider BWTF; rained last week; used spare turbidity vial for all samples; spare pre-verification = 0.05 NTU; lab-verification = 0.06 NTU; no swell; sunny; no wind; clear; parking garage was drained but now flooded

ENT sample taken for Surfrider BWTF; rained last week; used spare turbidity vial for all samples; spare pre-verification = 0.05 NTU; lab-verification = 0.06 NTU; 4th turbidity = 7.75; 5th turbidity = 7.50; no swell; sunny; no wind; clearer than usual

ENT sample taken for Surfrider BWTF; rained last week; used spare turbidity vial for all samples; spare pre-verification = 0.05 NTU; lab-verification = 0.06 NTU; no swell; sunny; no wind; 4th turbidity sample = 18.6

Heavy rains from 1/8/24-1/10/24, spare turbidity vial used in field, 4th turbidity = 12.5, 2nd temp reading: Sal = 23.2, D.O. = 22.7, rotten smell at resturant, mid-high tide, brown water, plant debris

Heavy rains from 1/8/24-1/10/24, spare turbidity vial used in field, strong shorebreak, 4th turbdity = 10.9, water looks less brown than 2 days ago, 5th turbidity = 13.3, very brown water, plant debris
Heavy rains from 1/8/24-1/10/24, spare turbidity vial used in field, suspended particles in turbidity vial, brown water but looks less brown today
Heavy rains from 1/8/24-1/10/24, used normal turbidity vial at this site only instead of spare vial, no ash, sample bucket looks clear, 4th turbidity = 2.50
Heavy rains from 1/8/24-1/10/24, spare turbidity vial used in field, ocean water appeared more clear nearshore than Wednesday, trade winds have picked up, light sprinkle during testing

Heavy rains from 1/8/24-1/10/24, spare turbidity vial used in field, monk seal at sampling area but swam about 20 yards north to rest, clearer than 2 days ago but visibly browner at reef, 4th turbidity = 7.89
Heavy rains from 1/8/24-1/10/24, spare turbidity vial used in field, visibly brown water in sampling area, low tide, had to walk >100ft out from shoreline to reach knee deep
About 0.25 inch of rain recorded from the Lahainaluna gauge in last 24 hours. High surf ~4ft. Stormy. Windy from the North. Choppy water. Rain in distance.

About 0.25 inch of rain recorded from the Lahainaluna gauge in last 24 hours. Sprinkling while sampling. Very dark water. 3ft shorebreak. Windy and cloudy. Choppy water. 4th turbidity reading = 7.79 after leveling meter. 5th turbidity reading = 9.18. 6th turbidity reading = 8.61.
About 0.25 inch of rain recorded from the Lahainaluna gauge in last 24 hours. Lots of white floaters in the turbidity sample. Windy. Stormy. Choppy. Cloudy.
About 0.25 inch of rain recorded from the Lahainaluna gauge in last 24 hours. Wind is picking up. Cloudy. 4ft swell outside breakwall. Stormy. Choppy. Cloudy.

About 0.25 inch of rain recorded from the Lahainaluna gauge in last 24 hours. A lot of dead coral on beach. Water cloudy with more shorebreak than normal. Stormy. Windy. Cloudy. Choppy. 4th turbidity reading = 13.2.

About 0.25 inch of rain recorded from the Lahainaluna gauge in last 24 hours. Sprinkling. Windy. Cloudy. Choppy surf. Stormy. Water pooled in culvert. Lots of dead coral and large plant debris on beach. 4th turbidity reading = 19.1.

About 0.25 inch of rain recorded from the Lahainaluna gauge in last 24 hours. Stormy. Cloudy. Very windy from the North. Choppy water. Lots of dead coral and large plant debris on beach. 4th turbidity reading = 9.40. 5th turbidity reading = 9.37. 4 split nutrient samples were collected and evenly distributed: 2 to SOEST and 2 to UHMC WQ Lab.

Salinity values QA'ed out due to malfunctioning probe. Low tide. Small 0-1ft swells. Sunny, hot. No wind. Calm water. Salinity & DO read a 2nd time, with no significant difference. Culvert had water, not flowing, dripping from roof/top. Salinity temperature read = 24.1.
Salinity values QA'ed out due to malfunctioning probe. Small 0-1ft swells. No wind. Sunny, hot. Calm water. Low tide. 2nd pH reading = 7.97. Salinity temperature = 24.1.
Salinity values QA'ed out due to malfunctioning probe. Small 0-1ft swells. No wind. Sunny, hot. Calm water. Low tide. Salinity temperature = 24.0.

Salinity values QA'ed out due to malfunctioning probe. A little bit of oil floating on water ~8ft from sample spot. Yellow seaweed on wood plant by sample area. Lahaina Harbor spare turbdity vial used. 4th turbidity reading = 1.02. Salinity temp = 51.0. DO temp = 25.3. pH temp = 25.3. Set DO probe to manual salinity correction mode at 35.0 ppt, and then DO read = 6.65, DO temp = 25.3.
Salinity values QA'ed out due to malfunctioning probe. Low tide. Sunny, hot. Calm water. No wind. Salinity temperature = 36.5.
Salinity values QA'ed out due to malfunctioning probe. Low tide. Lots of small dead coral on the beach. Sunny, hot. Calm water. Small swell. No wind. Salinity temperature = 35.8.

Salinity values QA'ed out due to malfunctioning probe. Low tide. Sample taken ~50yrds from shore to reach knee deep. Lots of small dead coral on the beach. Sunny, hot. Calm water. Small swell at outer reef. No wind. 4th turbidity = 3.91. Salinity temperature = 36.0.
Rained a little today & yesterday. Currently drizzling. Low tide. 1-2ft shorebreak. Overcast. Cloudy. Little gaps of sun. 4th turbidity = 3.25. Read DO temp 2x still the same.
Rained a little today & yesterday. Backflow - trickle @ Kahoma Stream. Overcast. Cloudy. Light wind. Small ~1ft shorebreak.
Rained a little today & yesterday. 1ft shorebreak. Partly cloudy. No wind. Gloomy water. More filter socks and mitigators installed.
Rained a little today & yesterday. Yellow algae growing at sample site. Low tide. Boom inside harbor moved. Partially cloudy. Light breeze.
Rained a little today & yesterday. Water at shore is clear. Cloudy. Calm. Crabs are back on the beach. Low tide.
Rained a little today & yesterday. Cloudy. Small breeze. Suns peeking out. A lot clearer than normal. Getting hot. Calm water.
Rained a little today & yesterday. Shoreline murky with plant debris. Cloudy. Small breeze. Had to walk 50ft to be knee deep to sample. Much clearer. Calm water.
Trickle of flowing water, uncertain of source, may be leaky pipes or A/C. Green algae at sample site. Low tide. No wind. Sunny. Less than 1ft shorebreak. Limu collected.

Kahoma Stream flowing. Brown water to 60ft. Sunny. Small wave action. Boats coming and going. No wind. Water glisining indicating lots of fresh/ground water. Water felt cold. Red algae on rocks. 2nd Salinity & DO reading: Sal = 18.64ppt, DO = 104.4 mg/L.
Brown algae on rocks. Wind from ocean. Small 1ft waves. Sunny, hot. 4th turbidity reading = 3.20
Very windy, north wind from the ocean. Very low tide. Sunny. Yellow-brown algae at sample site. PC crews working on docks. Met Andrea Kealoha at wharf.
Very windy, north wind off ocean. Sunny. Monk seal on beach. Water is clear and calm. Debris on beach.
Partly cloudy. Very windy, north wind off ocean. Water is calm and clear. Ran DO 2nd time, confirmed values. 4th turbidity reading = 2.43.

Partly cloudy. Very windy, north wind off ocean. Turbid water. Brown water to 120ft. Samples taken 30ft off shore to reach knee deep. Turtle swam very close by while sampling. 4th turbidity reading = 5.86. Kaua'ula stream flowing in Puamana.
Low tide @ 9:47am. Sunny. Partially cloudy. No wind. Calm water. No swell. 0-0.5 shorebreak. Low enough tide to wade in for sampling. 4th turbidity reading = 1.54.

Low tide @ 9:47am. 4-6inch trickle of clear water from Kahoma Stream. Ocean clear but black debris in bucket sample. Overcast. No wind. No swell. 4th turbidity reading = 4.67. 5th turbidity reading = 3.56. 6th turbidity reading = 4.32.
Low tide @ 9:47am. Pole sampling. Light wind. Overcast. No swell. Outlet Mall debris removal. 4th turbidity reading = 2.87.
Low tide @ 9:47am. Small patch of oil sheen on water. Construction on the dock. Breezy. Overcast.
Low tide @ 9:47am. Breezy. Cloudy. Calm, clear water. Muggy, hot. 4th turbidity reading = 1.35. 5th turbidity reading = 1.31.
Low tide @ 9:47am. Ocean clear. Sunny, hot. Partly cloudy. No wind.
Low tide @ 9:47am. Walked out 100ft to sample because tide was low. Water very clear. Debris at shoreline. Hot, sunny. 4th turbidity reading = 1.68. 5th turbidity reading = 2.04.
On and off rain from overnight. Muggy. Lots of debris removal and lot clearing in the burn zone. 3-4ft swells. Brownish water. Sunny. Shorebreak. Surfrider May 15 report recorded medium enterococcus.

On and off rain from overnight. Muggy. Lots of debris removal and lot clearing in the burn zone. Narrow stream, more ocean water going in than fresh water going out. Brown water. Sloppy 1-2ft swells. Sometimes 2-3ft swells. Partly cloudy. No wind. Turbidity vial has brown micro-particulates. Surfrider May 15 report recorded medium enterococcus.
On and off rain from overnight. Muggy. Lots of debris removal and lot clearing in the burn zone. 1-2ft swells. Light breeze. Filtered sun.

On and off rain from overnight. Muggy. Lots of debris removal and lot clearing in the burn zone. Pieces of shredded black plastic in sample area. Small patches of oil sheen. Sunny, hot. 4ft swell past breakwall. Light breeze. Surfrider May 15 report recorded medium enterococcus. 4th turbidity reading = 3.03.

On and off rain from overnight. Muggy. Lots of debris removal and lot clearing in the burn zone. Maui Princess boat is stuck on reef, ~150yds out right in line with sample site, boat grounded 1-2 days ago. 5-6ft swells ~150yds out. No wind. Sunny. Brownish water. No shore break. Monk seal ~ 100yds away on beach. Read pH twice, confirmed value = 7.93. Surfrider May 15 report recorded high enterococcus.

On and off rain from overnight. Muggy. Lots of debris removal and lot clearing in the burn zone. Brown water. No shorebreak. 3-4ft swells ~150yds out at reef break. No wind. Sunny. pH low = 7.92, confirmed with 2nd reading. 4th turbidity reading = 20.9.

On and off rain from overnight. Muggy. Lots of debris removal and lot clearing in the burn zone. Brown water. No shorebreak. 3-4ft swells ~150yds out at reef break. No wind. Sunny. pH = 8.05, confirmed. Kaua'ula stream in Puamana had water, uncertain if it reached the ocean. Surfrider May 15 report recorded medium enterococcus.
Very low tide. Honu resturant construction ongoing. Water looked clear. 1ft swell. No wind. Sunny, no clouds. Brown limu.

Very low tide. Flowing Kahoma about 3ft wide. Brown plant debris in water. Brownish-murky water. 1ft swell. No wind. Sunny. No clouds. Brown and white micro-particulates in turbidity vial. 4th turbidity reading = 4.78. 5th turbidity reading = 4.12.

Lots of commercial and residential debris removal in the burn zone. Very low tide.  4 people paddling on surfboards 300ft out, looking like heading to harbor surfbreak. Water looked very clear. Light wind. Sunny. No clouds. <1ft waves. Outer reef 2-4ft waves 100yrd out. 4th turbidity reading = 3.45.

Lots of commercial and residential debris removal in the burn zone. Very low tide. Water looked pretty clear. Oil sheen in the corner. Light breeze. Someone said they've seen lots of fish and turtles in the harbor. Sunny. No clouds. 3-6ft waves outside the breakwall ~+7 surfers. 4th turbidity reading = 1.90. 5th turbidity reading = 1.80.

Lots of commercial and residential debris removal in the burn zone. Very low tide. Flat, calm water. Clear water. 2 paddle boarders passed through sample site before sampling. Large boat removed off outer reef directly out from sample site, lots of piled up dead coral rubble remains. Light breeze, Sunny. No clouds. 3-6ft waves at outer reef 100yrd out.

Lots of commercial and residential debris removal in the burn zone. Very low tide. Crystal clear water. No wind. Sunny, hot. No clouds. 3-6ft waves at outreef ~100yrd out. Lots of crabs on the beach. DO 2nd reading = 7.21 mg/L, 110.7%. Salinity 2nd reading = 35.9 ppt. 4th turbdity reading = 0.98.

Lots of commercial and residential debris removal in the burn zone. Extreme low tide. Freshwater flow / erosion next to shore. Sampled about 150ft from shore to reach knee deep. Crystal clear water. No wind. Sunny, hot. 3-6ft waves at outer reef ~100yrd out. 5 people surfing at the surfbreak. DO 2nd reading = 7.38 mg/L, 114.2%. Full stream flow from Kaua'ula Stream, uncertain if it reached the ocean.

Honu resturant building tenting for termites. No flow. Light breeze. Textured water. 1ft shorebreak. Clear water. Salinity 2nd reading = 35.0. Temperature (from Sal probe) 2nd reading = 26.2. DO 2nd reading = 5.70, 84.6%. Temperature (from DO probe) 2nd reading = 25.7. Turbidity Verification Field-Pre-Sample (Low) = 6.65, 6.60, 6.62.
Small stream flow. Overcast. Light sprinkling. Breezy. 1ft swell. Floaties in turbidity sample. 4th turbidity reading = 2.04. 5th turbidity reading = 3.96. 6th turbidity reading = 1.83.

Bubba Gumps & Outlet Mall debris cleared. Active machine work in area. Immediate shore side debris finally removed. Windy. Ash rubble and dirt flying. <1ft swell. 4th turbidity reading = 3.97. 5th turbidity reading = 3.25.
Clear but murky on the bottom. No wind. Flat water. 4 surfers at breakwall. 4th turbidity reading = 1.20.
1-2ft swell at the outer reef. Cloudy water. Flat water. 4th turbidity reading = 5.61. 5th turbidity reading = 5.24.
Sunny, hot. No wind. Cloudy / murky water. 1-2ft swell at the outer reef. Flat water. Baby honu swam by after sampling 4th turbidity reading = 5.56. 5th turbidity reading = 5.63.
1-2ft swell at outer reef. Brown / murky water in nearshore. Sunny, hot. No wind. Flat water. Kauaula stream flowing from street view.

Salinity & DO Values QA'ed out (probe malfunction). Concern of salinity probe malfunction in the field, confirmed malfunction in the lab from post verification. *Temperature off pH probe. Brownish algae on rocks. 1-2ft swell. Calm water. Clear water. Sunny. No wind. Waft of sea smell. Abundance of green and brown limu north of site. 2nd read: Salinity = 26.7ppt, Sal temp = 37.5C, DO = 6.90 mg/L, DO temp = 25.6, DO = 97.7%. 4th turbidity reading = 1.33. 5th turbidity reading = 0.86, after cleaning vial with cloth.

Salinity Values QA'ed out (probe malfunction). Concern of salinity probe malfunction in the field, confirmed malfunction in the lab from post verification. *Temperature off pH probe. *DO salinity correction set to manual 35.0 ppt. Stream flow about 1-2ft wide. 1-2ft swell. Calm water. Sunny. No wind. Plant debris in water. Salinity temp = 34.8C. Salinity = 28.0ppt. DO (before manual preset) = 6.60mg/L, 94.4%.

Salinity Values QA'ed out (probe malfunction). Concern of salinity probe malfunction in the field, confirmed malfunction in the lab from post verification. *Temperature off pH probe. *DO salinity correction set to manual 35.0 ppt. 1-2ft swell. Calm water. No wind. Partly cloudy. Water looked cloudy. Salinity temp = 36.1C. 4th turbidity reading = 4.23. 5th turbidity reading = 2.65. 6th turbidity reading = 2.58.

Salinity Values QA'ed out (probe malfunction). Concern of salinity probe malfunction in the field, confirmed malfunction in the lab from post verification. *Temperature off pH probe. *DO salinity correction set to manual 35.0 ppt. Light oil sheen at sample site. Calm water. No wind. Mostly sunny. Hot. 2ft waves outside breakwall. Salinity temp = 36.1C.

Salinity Values QA'ed out (probe malfunction). Concern of salinity probe malfunction in the field, confirmed malfunction in the lab from post verification. *Temperature off pH probe. *DO salinity correction set to manual 35.0 ppt. Very clear water. Breezy. 1-2ft swell on outer reef. Mostly sunny, hot. Calm water. Salinity temp = 35.6C. 4th turbidity reading = 2.41. 5th turbidity reading = 1.95. 6th turbidity reading = 2.06.

Salinity Values QA'ed out (probe malfunction). Concern of salinity probe malfunction in the field, confirmed malfunction in the lab from post verification. *Temperature off pH probe. *DO salinity correction set to manual 35.0 ppt. Clear with onshore silt suspension. Light breeze. Calm water. Sunny, hot. Turbidity vial has visible floating micro particulates. 1-2ft swell on outer reef. Salinity temp = 36.8C.

Salinity Values QA'ed out (probe malfunction). Concern of salinity probe malfunction in the field, confirmed malfunction in the lab from post verification. *Temperature off pH probe. *DO salinity correction set to manual 35.0 ppt. Light breeze. Calm water. 1-2ft surf at outer reef. Sunny, hot. Sharks, 6-8 reef sharks about 100 yards off-shore. Sediment stirred up behind samplers from walking. Salinity temp = 37.3.

1ft shorebreak. Sunny. No wind. Flat, calm water. Pretty clear water. No clouds. Read pH 2x stayed same. Floating brown flakes in turbidity vial. 4th turbidity reading = 2.89. 5th turbidity reading = 1.41. 6th turbidity reading = 1.78. 7th turbidity reading = 1.56.
Boat activity. Clear and brownish water. 1ft shorebreak. Sunny. Flat, calm water. No wind. High tide in stream, small 1ft flow of freshwater. No clouds. 4th turbidity reading = 4.08.
Brownish water / murky. Immediate lot adjacent to site is cleared and covered with gravel. 4th turbidity reading = 3.91. 5th turbidity reading = 4.78.
No wind. Flat, calm water. 2ft swell outside of breakwall. Sunny. No clouds.
No wind. Flat, calm water. Few clouds. Sunny. Clearish / cloudy water. 2ft swell at outer reef.
Brown water nearshore. Sunny. Light west breeze. Few clouds. 2ft swell at outer reef. Read DO 2x and confimed; DO low. 4th turbidity reading = 16.3.

Very brown water nearshore. 3-4 black tip reef sharks near sample site. 2 surfers at surf break. 1-2ft waves at outer reef. West wind 5 knots. Wind textured water. Sunny. Partly cloudy. Lots being cleared adjacent to truck / mobile lab.

High tide. Relatively clear water. 2-3ft swell. Shorebreak. Sunny. Calm water. No wind. Particulates in turbidity vial. 4th turbidity reading = 1.61. 5th turbidity reading = 2.02. 6th turbidity reading = 2.72. 7th turbidity reading = 2.01. Read DO 2x, confirmed values. Read pH 2x, confirmed values.
High tide. Stream connecting with ~4ft flow. 2-3ft swell. Shorebreak. Brownish hue in the water. Calm water. Sunny. No wind. Sandy in sample. Algae in sample. 4th turbidity reading = 4.85.
Grayish-brown water. High tide. 2-3ft swell. Shorebreak. Sunny. Light breeze, trades. Lightly wind textured water. Particulates in turbidity sample. 4th turbidity reading = 4.74.
3-4ft swell outside the harbor/breakwall. Breeze from trades. Poor visibility in water. School of small reef fish at sample site. Sunny. Calm water. Slightly wind textured.

High tide. 2ft swell 50yrds out on outer reef. Brownish water nearshore, little murky. Breezy from trades. Wind-textured ocean. Construction work on 505 condos. 0.5ft shorebreak. Sunny. Brown micro-particulates in turbidity vial. 4th turbidity reading = 6.91. 5th turbidity reading = 5.51. 6th turbidity reading = 4.78.

Very brown water nearshore to 40ft out, murky to 100ft out. Breezy from trades. Sunny, hot. 2-3ft swell at outer reef 50yrds out. Calm ocean. Wind-textured water. 0.5ft shorebreak. Sediment in the sample. Temperature high but DO confrimed temperature at 27.9C. pH confirmed, 2nd read = 7.98.

Very brown water nearshore, seems to be murky for 50yrds. 2-3ft swell at outer reef 50yrds out. Breezy from trades. Sunny, hot. Calm water, wind-textured. Sediment in samples. Read pH 2x, confirmed values. 4th turbidity reading = 8.85. 5th turbidity reading = 9.85.

High tide at 5:15am (2.3ft), low tide at 11:38am (0.6ft). Strong fishy smell in parking lot. High tide. 1-2ft shorebreak. No wind. Glassy water. Honu resturant remodeling/renovation with windows open. Little murky. 3 turtles in water. Partly cloudy. 4th turbidity reading = 3.04.
0-1ft shorebreak. 10-12ft stream connection, flowing. Clear water. No wind. Monk seal in water. High tide. Calm water. Partly cloudy. 4th turbidity reading = 4.83. 5th turbidity reading = 4.15.
Lightly murky water. Dropping, high tide. 1-2ft shorebreak. Partly cloudy. No wind. Calm water. 1-2ft swell. 4th turbidity reading = 5.69. 5th turbidity reading = 4.77.
2-3ft swell outside of breakwall. No wind. Sunny, hot. Glassy water. High tide, dropping.
Small break out at reef. Murky + brown water nearshore ~50ft out. Sunny. Calm wind + water. Tide dropping.
1ft swell at outter reef. Very brown water nearshore. Breeze from trades. Sunny, hot. Calm water. Dropping tide. Dog (Miley) just walked across the beach before sampling.
1ft swell at outer reef. Very brown water nearshore to ~25yrds. Breeze from trades. Partly cloudy. Calm water. Dropping tide. 4th turbidity reading = 14.9.
Overcast. No wind. Stream flow may just be tidal in/out. 2-3ft shorebreak. Calm/glassy water. 4th turbidity reading = 2.49.
Overcast. No wind. Murky/brown shorebreak (1-2ft). UFO boat in water ~100ft out. Stream connecting ~1-3ft.
Overcast. No wind. 2-3ft shorebreak. Murky water. Visible floaters in sample cell. 4th turbidity reading = 3.62. 5th turbidity reading = 2.67.
Overcast. No wind. 3-4ft swell at harbor surf spot & breakwall, surfers out. 4th turbidity reading = 0.99.
Overcast. No wind. Debris removal in progress, two excavators. Murky water. High swell/tide. 4th turbidity reading = 11.0. Water in nutrient sample is a little short.
Overcast. Light breeze. High tide. 1-2ft shorebreak. Brown water. 3-4ft swell at outer reef. 4th turbidity reading = 18.9.
Overcast. No wind. Brown water. 0-1ft shorebreak. High tide. 3-4ft swell at outer reef surf spot, surfers out. 4th turbidity reading = 31.1.
Shorebreak 0-2ft. Possible ground water light drizzle. Calm water. Light breeze. Overcast. 4th turbidity reading = 2.98. 5th turbidity reading = 1.42. Some floating particulates (fine & few).

Full stream flow +25ft across. Cold water. Brown water. Lots of plant debries in all samples. 1ft shorebreak. Light drizzling. Calm water. No wind. Overcast. Read salinity 2nd time to confirm. 4th turbidity reading = 6.20.

0-1ft shorebreak. Road paving on Front St. right above sampling. Tons of trucks and pavement being poured. Sunny, hot. No wind. Pretty clear water. Little swell. Glassy water. 4th turbidity reading = 3.24.
No wind. Glassy water. Small fish. Little oil sheen. 1-2ft surfbreak outside of harbor. Partly cloudy. Surfers at break. 4th turbidity reading = 0.83.
1 fisherman 40 yrds south on the beach. Sunny, very hot. Light breeze. Glassy water. 1ft swell at outer reef. Beautiful! Pretty clear water. Low tide.

Later start time to the sampling day at 7:45am going forward. Sunny. Light breeze. 1-2ft shorebreak. Tidal inflow at streamflow entry. Visible debris in turbidity vial and bucket (algae?). 4th turbidity reading = 2.48.

Later start time to the sampling day at 7:45am going forward. Sunny. Light breeze. 1-2ft shorebreak. Streamflow ~4ft wide with tidal inflow to Front Street. Water is brown with plant debris suspended. Visible debris in turbidity vial. 4th turbidity reading = 10.1. 5th turbidity reading = 8.97.
Later start time to the sampling day at 7:45am going forward. Sunny. High thin clouds. Light breeze. 1-2ft shorebreak. White seafoam. 4th turbidity reading = 2.24.
Later start time to the sampling day at 7:45am going forward. Sunny. No breeze. Few scattered clouds. 2-3ft waves outside the breakwall at the surf spots, couple people surfing.

Later start time to the sampling day at 7:45am going forward. Light breeze. Sunny. High tide. 1-2ft shorebreak. 2-4ft surf at outer reef. Whitish grainy film on water's surface at site. 4th turbidity reading = 7.12.
No wind. Glassy. Gentle 1ft shorebreak. Water looked clear. Partly cloudy. Tiny bits of algae in bucket. Surfrider 12/11 report: high enterococcus bacteria 2481.

Calm. Barely any waves. Very calm breeze. Local fishing with 3 rods about 20 yds away. Small boats coming & going from ramp. Sunny. 4ft opening from Kahoma Stream. Water felt cold. Brownish hue in ocean. Small plant debris. 4th turbidity reading = 1.56. Surfrider 12/11 report: high enterococcus bacteria 1723.
1-2ft swells. Light breeze. Calm water. Few clouds. 4th turbidity reading = 3.09. DO temperature = 25.3. Surfrider 12/11 report: low enterococcus bacteria <10.

A few convict tangs nearby. Sunny. Light breeze. Tree removal & asbestos removal at library, debris removal at courthouse. 4th turbidity reading = 0.82. Surfrider 12/11 report: low enterococcus bacteria <10.
Low tide. Sunny, hot. Clear water. No swell. Calm water. No wind. Breakwall Surfrider 12/11 report: low enterococcus bacteria <10.

Started later in the day after watching weather & lightning. Rained & lightning across Maui last night & this morning. Very extreme brown water to 100-150 yrds out. Sunny, hot. Partly cloudy. Light wind. Low tide, rising. Unplugged pH & plugged in the other port, 2nd pH reading = 7.99.

Rained & lightning across Maui last night & this morning. Extreme brown water to 150 yrds out. Sunny, hot. No wind. Low tide. Partly cloudy. Cold water. No swell. Calm water. 2nd salinity reading = 15.77 ppt. 2nd DO reading = 7.90mg/L.

Rained & lightning across Maui last night & this morning. Sunny. SW winds 10knts. Choppy water. Clear water. 1ft swell. Litter on the beach. Read DO 2x, values are the same. 4th turbidity reading = 2.88.

Rained & lightning across Maui last night & this morning. Sunny. SW winds 10knts. Clear water. Mini sargent fish at sample site. Choppy water. 4th turbidity reading = 1.39. 5th turbidity reading = 1.36.
Rained & lightning across Maui last night & this morning. Cloudy water. Sunny. SW winds 10knts. Choppy water. No swell.

Started later in the day waiting for the storm to clear enough to allow for sampling. >2in rain in 24 hours. Huge storm & flooding last night. Rained heavy this morning. Low tide. Extreme brown/red water nearshore for at least 300yrds. Stormy. Choppy ocean. Kona winds 10knts. Drizzling off on on. Hot, muggy. 1ft shorebreak. Parking lot fully puddled with water.

>2in rain in 24 hours. Huge storm & flooding last night. Rained heavy this morning. Full stream flow >1ft deep. Extreme red brown water nearshore >400yrds out. Stormy, suns peaking out. Drizzling while sampling & reading. Choppy ocean. +10knts Kona winds. Hot, muggy. 1ft shorebreak. Read salinity & DO 2x, confirmed values.

>2in rain in 24 hours. Huge storm & flooding last night. Rained heavy this morning. Stormy. Drizzling while sampling & reading. Choppy ocean. 2ft swell outer reef. Brown water nearshore to 50 yrds. Patches of brown water outer reef. 1ft shorebreak. Kona winds 15-20knts. Raining while reading. Signs of flooding and puddles. 2nd DO reading = 7.00mg/L, 103.1%.

>2in rain in 24 hours. Huge storm & flooding last night. Rained heavy this morning. 10+ boats docked in the harbor for storm watch. 2 boats docked right at sample site, grabbed sample between the 2. Raining during sampling & reading. 10knts of Kona winds. 2-3ft swell outside of breakwall. Brown water outside of breakwall. Stormy. Choppy ocean. Puddles on street.

>2in rain in 24 hours. Huge storm & flooding last night. Rained heavy this morning. Low tide. Brown water nearshore to 200 yrds out. Stormy. Off and on drizzling. Kona winds 10-15knts. Sun peaking out. Messy / choppy ocean. 2-3ft at swell outer reef. Big puddle in the parking lot.
Small 1/2 ft swells. Sunny skies. 4th turbidity reading = 2.13. 5th turbidity = 2.57. Tide 8:40am - 0.75ft
A lot of plant debris. Brown water. Calm wind. Rain cloud to north. Blue sky overhead. 4th turbidity reading = 6.40. 5th turbidity reading = 6.65.
Blue skies. 1ft swell. Calm wind. 4th turbidity reading = 2.56.
Oil slicks 10 ft from sample site. Deeper water. No waves. 4th turbidity reading = 1.27.
Sunny. No clouds. Gentle breeze has picked up. Calm clear water. 4th turbidity reading = 2.47.
Fresh water trickle from under Mala Tavern, 1 ft waves, no wind, clear sunny sky, low tide -0.1 ft at 10:29 am, tide dropping, 4th turbidity reading = 1.13 NTU
1 ft waves, no wind, clear sunny skiy, tour boats on the water, diesel smell on the water, clean beach, 4th turb reading = 1.45 NTU, 5th turb = 1.62 NTU, DO read 2x, low tide -0.1 ft at 10:29 am
Water looks hazy, 1 ft waves, no wind, sunny sky, dropping tide, low tide -0.1 ft at 10:29 am, 4th turbidity = 3.71, 5th = 3.25
Looks clear, calm water, no clouds, sunny, no wind, low tide -0.1 ft at 10:29 am
Water looks clear & calm, no clouds, no wind, ~0.5' reef break, no shorebreak, sunny & hot, low tide -0.1 ft at 10:29 am
High tide @ 9 AM 0.3' and Low tide @ 1:09 PM 0.1'; Cloudy, heavy vog, 1/2 ft waves @shorebreak, water looks clear, more sand at shore than usual, no wind.

High tide @ 9 AM 0.3' and Low tide @ 1:09 PM 0.1'; Heavy vog, 1/2 ft waves at shore, barge work in progress with heavy machinery, 3 dive boats within the loading zone, no wind, plant debris in water, 4th NTU reading = 3.81, 5th NTU = 3.74.
High tide @ 9 AM 0.3' and Low tide @ 1:09 PM 0.1'; Heavy vog, cloudy water, bad rotting smell, 1/2 ft waves, algae on rocks, 4th turbidity = 1.66
High tide @ 9 AM 0.3' and Low tide @ 1:09 PM 0.1'; heavy vog, lear water, no waves, no wind.
High tide @ 9 AM 0.3' and Low tide @ 1:09 PM 0.1'; Heavy vog, clear warer, 0.5 ft shorebreak + waves on reef, 4th turbidity reading = 1.03, wind 5 mph.

low tide at 8:15 am, outgoing tide. rained on 4/22, had brown water advisory for west side. voggy day, partly cloudy. 1'ft shorebreak, drip coming out of small pipe from tavern, calm breeze to no wind. 4th turbidity reading = 3.30

low tide at 8:15 am, outgoing tide. rained on 4/22, had brown water advisory for west side. voggy day, partly cloudy.6" - 1' shorebreak, barely any stream flow, 4th turbidity reading = 17.9. 5th turbidity reading = 20.0

low tide at 8:15 am, outgoing tide. rained on 4/22, had brown water advisory for west side. voggy day, partly cloudy. 6" - 1' shorebreak, lots of limu on the rocks, 4th turbidity reading = 7.22. 5th turbidity reading = 4.70, sun is warming up, no bad smell today
low tide at 8:15 am, outgoing tide. rained on 4/22, had brown water advisory for west side. voggy day, partly cloudy. dredging work in harbor, windy the day before,

low tide at 8:15 am, outgoing tide. rained on 4/22, had brown water advisory for west side. voggy day, partly cloudy. 0 - 6" shorebreak, surf on reef 2-3ft, 4th turbidity reading = 2.67, 5th turbidity reading = 2.04
0.3 HT at 6am, overcast, no wind, 0.5 ft shore break, 4th turbidity reading = 0.90, limu on the rocks
Cloudy, no wond, water looks clear, small connection of freshwater 100 yards mauka from sample site, 4th turbidity = 2.01
Cloudy, calm shore break, pieces of large debris in the water visible, limu on the rocks, 4th turbidity = 1.85
Mostly cloudy, calm & clear harbor, 2-3' waves out at break, gentle breeze, 4th turbidity = 1.02
mostly cloudy, very clear water, rocks and reef exposed, 1ft break out at reef, 4th turbidity = 1.87, 5th turbidity = 1.71
Sunny, no wind, clear water, shore break 1-2ft, 4th turbidity = 2.87
Sunny, partly cloudy, warm, cloudy water, narrow stream flow connecting to ocean, 4th turbidity reading = 7.71
Sunny, slight breeze, surf on reed 2ft. shorebreak 1-2ft. Slight sewage smell. 4th turbidity reading = 3.74. Confirmed DO with a second read
Sunny, slight breeze, surf on reef 2-3ft. Algae scum in water 10ft away from sample site. 4th turbidity = 0.82. reopened to the public for pedestrians
Sunny, clear water, 0.5ft shorebreak
Partly cloudy, no wind, clear water, 1ft waces, drop coming from pipe mala tavern, smokey smell possibly coming from restaurant, 4th turb = 1.79; confirmed temp values
Sunny, flat water, calm, no wind, lots of trash on beach, wide channel flowing into ocean, DO temp = 26.2
Overcast, 0.5ft shorebreak, raining on kahalawai, water appears hazy, no fresh water flow but limu is present on rocks, floaters in turbidity sample, 4th turb = 4.19, 5th turb = 2.73
Overcast, no waves inside harbor, harbor water appears murkey
Overcast, really flat inside reef, clear water & exposed reefs
no storm water flowing but there is a light drip from the Mala Tavern pipe, calm water, partly cloudy, no wind
calm water, clear water, partly cloudy, no wind, gentle shore break, tour boat group gathering on land next to site, 3' Kahoma stream connection
sunny, partly cloudy, light breeze, 2-3 ft waves, rocky shoreline
sunny, calm, high tide, very warm out, minimal clouds
1/2' rolling + gentle shorebreak, hot, no breeze, * all sites high tide @ 11:30 1.9'
2-3' swells, brownish water, Clear sunny skies no fresh water flowing, low wind. Low tide 08:41- 0.1 Low tide
2ft shorebreak, brown water, many rocks on beach, clear skies, 0-5 mph wind
1-2' swells, light breeze, large surf on outside. water appears slightly brown, 4th turb 3.64, 5th turb 3.96
No waves inside the harbor, boat in the harbor fueling up, light breeze
Outer reef 2-3 ft waves, rocks exposed on the reef, water appears hazy, no water running off. 5-10 mph wind. Clear sunny skies, many surfers out/ 4th turb 6.48
tide is creeping up with 2ft shorebreak, sunny with minimal whispy clouds, water looked a little hazy, 4th turb:2.59, 5th=2.33, no wind.
Foul smell as we walked up to site, shorebreak was smaller than mala tavern. 4th turb=2.63, 5th=3.26, boat traffic during samply, sunny, no wind, minimal water from kahoma stream
sunny, no breeze, moderate shorebreak (2-3ft) 4th turb=1.34, 5th turb=1.58. We used the pole  bucket to grab turbidity and nutrient samples because of high bubbles in shore break. 5th turb=1.88
Teralani catamaran docked and cleaning boat deck 5ft from sample site, calm water and breeze in harbor, surf and surfers out at break wall
floating limu near sample site, 1-3ft surfbreak with surfers out, sunny, light breeze, hot, sparsy whispy clouds, gentle and rolling shorebreak. 4th turb=4.37, 5th turb=4.05, 6th turb=3.41
Sunny and light breeze, less than 1ft swell., water looks clear
Sunny and light breeze, less than 1ft swell, slight trickle flow, can smell charcoal/burning (from cooking). 4th turb= 1.41
Sunny, breeze, 1ft swell, small shorebreak. water nearshore looks clear
Sunny, breezy, harbor water has film and some debris on surface. boat achvely washing down next  to collection
sunny and calm with slight breeze. small waves 2ft breaking off shore - no surf on shoreline. 4th turb = 3.63
hint of a breeze, 1-2 ft shorebreak, incoming tide, no stream flow only tidal inflow/outflow, water is cloudy
water is cloudy @ high tide stir-up, 3-4' wide stream visible mauka of Front St., no breeze
light breeze, cloudy water, 1-2 ft shorebreak, mgL mistaken wrote in turbidity box
light breeze, construction active on pier

water is murky, light breeze, 1 ft shorebreak, refilled turbidity bottle (spare) from bucket to compare readings using spare vial, 16.7 (4th read), 17.4 (5th read) All - sunny, high tide at 6:14 am, 2.34 ft, back to original for all sites- turbidity vial
Shore break is 2ft plus, light breeze, no clouds, water looks calm out past shorebreak. 4th turb = 1.32
Rolling, calmer shorebreak for thie site water looks clear, no clouds, no wind
2ft shorebreak with high tide, used pole bucket to collect. Light wind, no clouds, very hot. 4th turb= 1.79. Suspended particles in turbidity vial, limu on rocks
Surfers out (not within 100ft), very light breeze, sunny, hot
1-2ft shorebreak, light breeze, water looks a little murky, limu on sand at high tide mark. Sunny, hot, no clouds.
